function.name: youtube_search
function.description: Search YouTube videos, channels, and playlists using YouTube Data API v3. Requires YOUTUBE_API_KEY in .env. Free quota: 10,000 units/day (100 units per search = ~100 searches/day). Get a free API key at: https://console.developers.google.com/

operation.description: Operation to perform: search (find videos/channels/playlists), get_video_details (get detailed info about a video), get_trending (get trending videos by region)

query.description: Search query (required for 'search' operation). Examples: 'Python tutorial', 'cat videos', 'AI news'

video_id.description: YouTube video ID (required for 'get_video_details' operation). 11 characters, e.g., 'dQw4w9WgXcQ'

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-50, default: 10). For 'search' and 'get_trending' operations

type.description: Type of results for 'search' operation (default: video)

order.description: Sort order for 'search' operation (default: relevance). date=newest first, rating=highest rated, viewCount=most viewed

region_code.description: 2-letter country code for 'search' and 'get_trending' operations (default: US). Examples: FR, GB, JP, BR

category_id.description: Category ID for 'get_trending' operation (optional). Examples: '10' (Music), '20' (Gaming), '24' (Entertainment), '25' (News), '28' (Science & Technology)

safe_search.description: Safe search mode for 'search' operation (default: none)
